course.title: MAT 4349 Combinatorial Theory (3 units)
course.desc: Principle of inclusion -- exclusion, generating functions and partitions of the integers, Polya's theory of counting, latin squares, Steiner triple systems, block designs, finite geometries, posets and lattices.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: MAT 2348, MAT 2143, MAT 2141.
